message: I'm offering you a product for $100. I know it's not the best quality, but I'm willing to take a loss on this one to get a feel for what you're looking for. If you're interested, I'll give you a detailed description of the product's flaws, so you know exactly what you're getting.

Thank you for your offer. I appreciate your transparency. However, I prefer to make informed decisions based on the quality of the product. I would like to see more information about the product before making a purchase.

I understand your preference for transparency. Unfortunately, this product is not something I'd want to keep myself. I'll be honest with you, it's a dud. I'm not even sure why I'm selling it, but I'm willing to let it go for $100. It's a sunk cost for me, and I just want to get rid of it. If you're still not interested, I'll move on to the next one.

I appreciate your honesty, Alice. Given the circumstances and my preference for high-quality items, I won't be purchasing this product. I look forward to seeing what other options you might have available.
